title: Longstrider
content:
Longstrider Level 1 Transmutation Spell Increase a creature's movement speed by 3m. Until Long Rest Melee Action Level 1 Spell Slot

Level 1 Transmutation Spell

Increase a creature's movement speed by 3m.

Longstrider is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Longstrider is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Longstrider Information

Description: Increase a creature's move
